thread.title: Sunrise Hitek Now Offers Custom Wind Sail Banners
thread.title_full: Sunrise Hitek Now Offers Custom Wind Sail Banners - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Sunrise Hitek Now Offers Custom Wind Sail Banners
text:
Sunrise Hitek offers a wide variety of outdoor signage options. Their newest offering are wind sail banners: https://www.sunrisehitek.com/product/feather-banners .
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) September 29, 2015
Sunrise Hitek has just added wind sail banners to its arsenal of outdoor signage solutions. Wind sail banners are great in that they work with the weather elements as opposed to against them ( https://www.sunrisehitek.com/product/feather-banners ). These signs can also be referred to as teardrop banners, feather banners, flying banners or sidewalk banners. An outdoor ground stake comes standard and an optional weighted water bag allows the banner to be used indoors, too. These are available in three sizes and can be made as single or double-sided.
Turn-key solution with custom graphic, indoor/outdoor hardware, and carrying bag Full color printing on polyester fabric with a beautiful finish Single or double-sided options available Designed to stay open, remain taut, and long-term display
About Sunrise Hitek Group, LLC.
Sunrise Hitek https://www.sunrisehitek.com/ is an Inc. 5000 company established in 1988 and employs the most advanced equipment and technology, such as G7-certified HP Indigo and UV flatbed presses, laser engraving, and digital die-cutting, to create best-in-class color printing, short-run packaging, P.O.P. retail displays, and signage products. A privately-owned enterprise, the company is based in Chicago and sells products worldwide.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12978973.htm
